A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only Star Wars film worse than this one is The Phantom Menace. Apart from a few semi-decent scenes\, and good visuals\, the film disappointed me in just about every possible way. The cast is great\, but the characters they portray are garbage. Crap humor. And worst of all: the outright destruction of everything that makes Luke Skywalker so wonderful and beloved. I'll never spend money on this franchise again. #NotABot
